titles.title: A bill to allow United States exporters to export agricultural commodities to Cuba in certain situations.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 5/19/1987--Introduced. Allows U.S. exporters to export agricultural commodities and products to Cuba if: (1) such commodities or products are available to Cuba from foreign exporters; and (2) such commodities or products are sold to Cuba at fair market value in exchange for cash or other goods without the assistance of Government credit.
